titles.title: National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation Establishment Act
A bill to establish a National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation to carry out activities to support and supplement the mission of the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11899)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11909-19910)

bill.summary: 8/16/1994--Introduced. National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation Establishment Act - Establishes the National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation as a charitable, nonprofit, non-U.S. corporation, to promote participation by private organizations in the activities of the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports. Authorizes appropriations.
